name: gimmeremmetokensbot
description: Telegram bot for Remme tokens distribution for testing purposes.

ENVIRONMENT.description: Environment value. For now, is used for detect review applications only.

DATABASE_URL.description: Databsae to store information about users.

MASTER_WALLET_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Faucet wallet private key to sign transactions.

MASTER_ACCOUNT_NAME.description: Faucet account with tokens to sent them to users' accounts.

STABLE_REMME_TOKENS_REQUEST_AMOUNT.description: Amount of tokens to send from master account.

REQUEST_TOKENS_PERIOD_IN_HOURS_LIMIT.description: Request tokens period in hours limit. For instance, `1` or `12`.

PRODUCTION_HOST.description: Server host, which runs bot. For instance, `https://gimmeremmetokensbot-staging.herokuapp.com`.
